mapper.sql: Id, ParId, MenuName, BeLock, Url, IsButton
mapper.insert: insert into AuthorityMenuClass (Id, ParId, MenuName, BeLock, Url, IsButton) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belock,jdbcType=BIT}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isbutton,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select:
SELECT AccoutId,MenuId,ParId,MenuName,isnull(Url,'') as Url,amc.IsButton,isnull(javaUrl,'/order/list') as javaUrl FROM dbo.AuthorityAccountMenuSet aam (nolock) JOIN AuthorityMenuClass amc(nolock) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.AccoutId=#{accountId} and amc.BeLock=CAST(0 as bit) UNION ALL
SELECT #{accountId} AS AccoutId,id AS MenuId,ParId,MenuName,isnull(Url,'') as Url,IsButton,isnull(javaUrl,'/order/list') as javaUrl FROM AuthorityMenuClass WHERE ParId=0 AND id IN(SELECT ParId FROM dbo.AuthorityAccountMenuSet aam (nolock) JOIN AuthorityMenuClass amc(nolock) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.AccoutId=#{accountId} and amc.BeLock=CAST(0 as bit)) and BeLock=CAST(0 as bit)
